advantages.name: Absolute Direction
advantages.description: You always know which way is north, and you can retrace any path you have traveled.

advantages.name: Acute Vision
advantages.description: +1 to all Vision rolls per level.

advantages.name: Ambidexterity
advantages.description: You can use both hands with equal skill.

advantages.name: Combat Reflexes
advantages.description: +1 to all active defense rolls, +1 to Fast-Draw, +2 to Fright Checks.

advantages.name: Enhanced Parry
advantages.description: +1 to Parry with one weapon skill per level.

advantages.name: Extra Attack
advantages.description: One extra attack per turn per level.

advantages.name: High Pain Threshold
advantages.description: Never suffer shock penalties. +3 to resist torture or pain.

advantages.name: Luck
advantages.description: Once per hour of play, you may reroll a single bad die roll.

advantages.name: Night Vision
advantages.description: Reduce darkness penalties by 1 per level.

advantages.name: Rapid Healing
advantages.description: You recover from injuries quickly. Heal at twice the normal rate.

disadvantages.name: Absent-Minded
disadvantages.description: You have trouble concentrating. Make an IQ roll to remember important details.

disadvantages.name: Bad Temper
disadvantages.description: Make a self-control roll whenever you face stress. On a failure, you lose your temper.

disadvantages.name: Blindness
disadvantages.description: You cannot see. -6 to most physical skills, but +3 to Hearing-based rolls.

disadvantages.name: Curious
disadvantages.description: You are naturally curious and must investigate interesting things.

disadvantages.name: Deafness
disadvantages.description: You cannot hear. Automatic failure on Hearing rolls.

disadvantages.name: Greed
disadvantages.description: Make a self-control roll when you encounter wealth. On failure, you must pursue it.

disadvantages.name: Honesty
disadvantages.description: You are naturally honest and law-abiding.

disadvantages.name: Impulsiveness
disadvantages.description: You hate talk and delay. Make a self-control roll when you must wait or plan.

disadvantages.name: Lame
disadvantages.description: One of your legs is crippled. Move at half speed, -3 to physical skills using legs.

disadvantages.name: Pacifism
disadvantages.description: You will not harm innocent beings.

disadvantages.name: Phobia
disadvantages.description: You have an unreasoning fear of a specific thing.

disadvantages.name: Poor Vision
disadvantages.description: -6 to all Vision rolls and ranged attacks.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: The ability to perform gymnastic stunts, roll, fall safely, etc.

skills.name: Administration
skills.description: The ability to organize and run organizations, handle paperwork, etc.

skills.name: Archaeology
skills.description: The study of past cultures through their physical remains.

skills.name: Brawling
skills.description: Skill at unarmed combat using punches, kicks, etc.

skills.name: Climbing
skills.description: The ability to scale walls, cliffs, trees, etc.

skills.name: Computer Operation
skills.description: The ability to use computers and common software.

skills.name: Cooking
skills.description: The ability to prepare appetizing, nutritious meals.

skills.name: Dancing
skills.description: The ability to dance well, including social and performance dancing.

skills.name: Driving
skills.description: The ability to drive ground vehicles under normal conditions.

skills.name: Fast-Draw
skills.description: The ability to quickly draw and ready a weapon.

skills.name: First Aid
skills.description: Basic medical care for injuries and illness.

skills.name: Guns
skills.description: Skill with firearms of all types.

skills.name: History
skills.description: Knowledge of past events and their significance.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: The ability to use fear to influence others.

skills.name: Jumping
skills.description: The ability to leap horizontally or vertically.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: The ability to lead and coordinate others.

skills.name: Lockpicking
skills.description: The ability to open locks without the proper key.

skills.name: Melee Weapon
skills.description: Skill with hand weapons like swords, clubs, etc.

skills.name: Observation
skills.description: The ability to spot important details in your environment.

skills.name: Photography
skills.description: The art and technique of taking good pictures.

skills.name: Research
skills.description: The ability to find information in libraries, databases, etc.

skills.name: Riding
skills.description: The ability to ride horses and other animals.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: The ability to move quietly and remain unseen.

skills.name: Swimming
skills.description: The ability to move through water.

skills.name: Throwing
skills.description: Skill at hurling objects accurately.
